title: Burnt Out, but Have More to Burn
detail_text: <:th_ch0212/>I’m burnt out...... seriously......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>There, there, Mia-chan. You worked hard. Kanata-chan will be your lap pillow~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>The concert was so fun! We accomplished so many things!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>The audience was super crowded, after all.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Lanzhu wants to perform again! Anything at all!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ahaha, it feels like we’re burnt out, but we seem to have more to burn!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Having more to burn...... That’s an interesting choice of words, but you’re not wrong.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>You’re right. Kasumin wants to put on an even cuter performance than today’s for our next concert~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I want to create a performance where I can express my passion even further!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Oh, right, everyone! Should we send a video to Aqours?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Yeah. Watching an encouraging video before a concert gets me fired up. We should definitely send one.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I’m ready to record. But can we fit everyone in the frame?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>We would be quite squished, wouldn’t we?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Being squished is fine! Shioriko-chan, come over here~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Huh!? Oh, Ayumu-san!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Mia-chan, this isn’t the time to be sleepy, you know~ Come on, let’s record the video~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Oh, come on, how is everyone so energetic!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
